posts.post_content:
1887 Old Judge Morris 

The card has a slanting to the left right border. It will only grade authentic. The card also has a break in the paper with a loss of paper in the upper right border parallel to the waist. Also, there is a couple of stains in the lower right side with one being parallel to the feet and ankles and the other parallel to between the "OLD JUDGE" and "CIGARETTES" lines. There is also a make in below and in the back half of "CIGARETTES." The back has a large stain and a couple marks.

$100.00 plus $6.00 s/h (certified mail).
If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal gift/Friends and Family.
[url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url]
